item.title: Day 0
item.description: Day 0 Terms Welcome to my tech blog. I’ve decided that every day in the month of August I’m going to try and ship something, preferably exploring a variety of frameworks and disciplines. Tentatively, I’m hoping to meet the following criteria every day: Create a publically accessible project demo and codebase Write about the process of creating it Avoid using tutorials or guides in favor of documentation1 I expect to discover that these conditions will be untenable within a week and will modify the conditions as required.

item.title: Day 1
